Christmas special

inside the kit

INSTA-Grow The BluePrint + FREE Content Planner

@bashabroad spent thousands of dollars learning and researching how to grow on Instagram just to realize that it is not that hard and definitely shouldn't cost you thousands of dollars. They used this research to develop our own strategies that helped us grow to over 20k followers in LESS than 6 months. We did this from scratch.



Aussie Sedona ADVENTURE Filter Pack

In the Aussie Sedona Adventure Filter Pack are 5 filter for mobile and 5 filter for desktop. Included in the puppy pack (which certainly looks cute on cats too, by the way) is a guide to help you with all your Lightroom questions!





Insta Colab Secrets

If you're a micro influencer who is interested in learning how to make money working with brands by building the perfect profile, creating a stunner of a portfolio, successfully pitch, negotiate, all about contracts and so many other incredible things, then this is sure to answer ALL your questions!


The Intrepid Travel Collection

The Intrepid Travel Collection by @candy_and_the_king ontains 20 mobile & 20 desktop filters. The Collection was inspired by their time spent living in Southeast Asia. Whether you are exploring your own backyard, adventuring to find a magical waterfall, trekking through lush jungle or chasing dreamy sunsets- The Intrepid Travel Collection has your images covered.




Collaborate with your Dream Hotel

A 3 weeks course teaching you everything you need to know about hotel collaboration. In this bundle, you'll receive all 3 parts that include exercies, a step-by-step guide through the process of landing a successful collab, skill building, email templates, support to get you unstuck and so much more!




Arcadia Filter Collection

The Arcadia collection includes 20 filters that were inspired by @_letsescapetogether_'s travels through Iceland, Norway, Slovenia and Indonesia. These moody Lightroom filters are the perfect way to enhance your outdoor portraits and landscape photography.





Printable 2021 Calender - A3 to A5

@candy_and_the_king explored Laos from top to bottom, seeing some of the most beautiful landscapes and people. They created this calendar to express their gratitude towards the people, culture and places. Each month of this calendar boasts the beauty of Laos through various landscape photographs captured in Laos. This calendar is suitable as an A3 & A4 wall calender or A5 desk calender.



Planet Earth Collection

Inspired by Earth, @through.the.llyn created this pack to give back to the planet. "We're the first generation to know what we're doing, and the last who have a chance to put things right. A portion of every purchase will be donated to WWF (World Wide Fund for Nature) So not only do you get to enhance your photos, but also the environment in which you took them."





Bonus Freebie!

With step-by-step guidance specifically to teaching in Asia and the Middle East, this book will take you by the hand and guide you through every decision, scenario and aspect about taking the steps to creating a travel lifestyle.
